# Replace All App Previews for an App Preview Set

**Web Service Endpoint**

Change the order of the app previews in a preview set.

## Listing and Reordering All Previews in a Set

- **List All App Previews for an App Preview Set**: List all ordered app previews in a preview set.
- **Get All App Preview IDs for an App Preview Set**: Get the ordered app preview IDs in a preview set.
